item.title: 2025-26 Student Advisory Council (SAC) - Application deadline September 24
item.description: Wednesday, September 24, 2025 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM - Applications are now open for the 2025–26 Student Advisory Council (SAC)! Hosted by Vice Provosts Dr. Rob Hradsky and Dr. Matt Oehlschlaeger, the SAC connects students with campus leadership to shape academics, student life, and RPI culture. Meetings are biweekly on Fridays, 12–1:30 PM. Apply by Sept. 24 to make your voice heard and create positive change. Questions? Contact Quadir “Q” Webster at webstq@rpi.edu.

item.title: Order of the Engineer Registration | Sept. 24
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 24, 2025 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - The Order of the Engineer is open to all senior and graduate engineering students. The Order is a national organization that fosters a spirit of pride and responsibility in the engineering profession. The ceremony will be held October 15th at 6:00 PM. You must attend to be inducted and receive your ring. Registration and sizing ends Friday, September 26th. To register: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSey…

item.title: Closure of Sage Avenue Roadway and Sidewalk Beginning September 22
item.description: Beginning Monday, September 22, 2025, RPI Facilities Management will begin a project to replace leaking steam pipes along the north sidewalk in front of E Dorm and across the roadway at the Sage Avenue campus entrance. As a result, the north sidewalk and entrance to the academic campus off Sage Avenue will be closed and will remain closed for approximately five to six weeks. item.title: These Hands Don’t Haze! | Sept. 26
item.description: Date: Friday, September 26, 2025 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM - For National Hazing Prevention Week, join various student leaders from across campus to take the anti-hazing pledge! When you sign the pledge, you’ll have the opportunity to add to our “These Hands Don’t Haze” mural. We’ll also have trivia, giveaways, and more! Stop by anytime between 10 a.m. - 6 p.m. outside of the Russell Sage Dining Hall to participate.

item.title: Cable Television Outage in Specific Campus Buildings
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the campus about an issue affecting CATV services in several buildings: Sage, Troy, Ricketts, and 87Gym. Our service provider has identify the issue–an underground cable–and will implement repairs as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate patience as we work toward a resolution. New information will be provided as soon as it becomes available. Thank you for your understanding.
item.author: Community

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar – “Assigning Learning in Percipio: A Guide for Supervisors”
item.description: This course provides supervisors with a step-by-step overview of how to assign learning content to employees using Percipio. You’ll learn how to search for relevant courses, create and manage assignments, track completion, and support your team’s development goals. Designed to be quick and practical, this session equips you with the tools needed to guide your team’s learning journey effectively.
